snippet: Wang Lijun, the charismatic police chief under the fallen politician Bo Xilai, will be tried on Tuesday in the southwestern city of Chengdu, according to a court official.
abstract: Trial date for is set for Wang Lijun, former police chief in Chongqing, China, under the fallen politician Bo Xilai; Wang faces charges of defection, illegal surveillance and taking bribes.
lead_paragraph: Wang Lijun, the charismatic police chief under the fallen politician Bo Xilai, will be tried on Tuesday in the southwestern city of Chengdu, according to a court official.

headline.seo: Wang Lijun, Chinese Official, to Go on Trial Tuesday
headline.main: China Sets Trial Date for Figure in Scandal
headline.print_headline: China: Trial Date Set for Figure Linked to a Political Scandal
